thread.title: Ground News - Israeli offensive has already killed 1% of Gaza and Sergey Lavrov alleges the exclusion of Moscow in peace agreements
thread.title_full: Ground News - Israeli offensive has already killed 1% of Gaza and Sergey Lavrov alleges the exclusion of Moscow in peace agreements

author: SIC Notícias
title: Ground News - Israeli offensive has already killed 1% of Gaza and Sergey Lavrov alleges the exclusion of Moscow in peace agreements
text:
Summary by SIC Notícias Israel concentrated the offensive in the center and south of the Gaza Strip, with several refugee camps as its main targets, where several fighters from Hamas and Islamic Jihad claim to be located. The Russian Foreign Minister points out the West's strategic failure to defeat Russia and accuses the main Western powers of excluding Moscow from a potential peace agreement in Ukraine. News in 15 minutes. Share menu More
